messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/15/2005 3:48:21 PM Eastern Standard Time, "mozafamily" <mozafamily@...> writes:

>
>
>
>I started a Yahoo group for child-led, life learners, unschoolers,
>etc. and now it's in danger of being shut down because I don't have
>any members - apparently I need to advertise more!<<<<<

Advertising certainly helps!


The group is
>called the Open Path Network, I origionally started it for any
>location ~ and I would still welcome anyone from any location who is
>into the same theories ~ I just hope to get some "locals" as well so
>perhaps we could plan some outings or have some playdates,etc. I
>know there is a group for KS but we;re closer to Columbia or Jeff
>City. I hope it's okey with the board owners that I post the link
>here:
>http://groups.yahoo.com/group/OpenPathNetwork
>Thank you! Barbara aka Moza<<<<<<<

You might have a HUGE influx just after the conference---since it's in that area of the country.

~Kelly
